name: Legendary high five hand crush
description:
Legendary high five hand crush is a family game where you have to smash as much hands as you can in 1 minute.

How to play:
Tap the colored hands when they appear and get the best score in 1 minute. Tap red ones 1 time, yellow 2 times and green 3 times.

Features:
- black and white theme
- nice background music
- simple to play
- great for improving your reaction time

Like smashing hands? Give us a rate and a review.
